phrases: It looks like the one Menma used to wear.
Take a good look at me!
If he does not take advantage of it, there may not be another.
Hey, I look like Menma, right?
Do not I look like her?
It is my fault Menma died that day.
It could not possibly be your fault.
I am telling you that it is my fault!
If I had not that to Menma, she would not have died.
If Menma were to reappear to anyone, it should be me.
To haunt or to curse me.
Either way, it should be me!
That is how I know she does not exist anymore.
Menma says she is right here.
She says thank you for the hairpin.
Look, I do not really understand it myself, but...
Are you sure we should let him go?
Well, I am done for today.
Did you already know about this?
You could say I caught on.
He would been asking me to hang out with him after school for a while.
He would pretend he was buying presents for his inexistent girlfriend.
A white one-piece dress with a ribbon.
Should we really have done that?
I figure you should squeeze all the pus out of a wound.
But because he is rotten to the core, if you squeeze it all out, then there might not be anything left.
You are not ugly at all, you are...
I thought it would suit you...
I thought so because I like you!
Jintan is going to get away, so...
So I have to go chase him!
We will talk about this later!
Maybe it does not go well with my glasses.
Do you want something to eat?
And you cannot find it anywhere nowadays.
You do not have to; anything else you have is fine.
She came to me, not Yukiatsu.
I did not care whether she was a ghost or a hallucination,
but I avoided thinking about it.
It is fun when we are all together.
It is fun being with Jintan.
That is why I felt that it is okay not to think about it.
They did not have Ken-chan Ramen.
You got all of this instead?
Just hurry up and sit down...
Jintan, I need to talk to you.
Anyway, the popsicle is going to melt.
I want you to grant my wish.
Why bring that up all of a sudden?
I am doing the best I can, you know...
And, of course, I have not been as obsessed as Yukiatsu,
I have a lot of things going on, too, you know!
I do not have the time to babysit you.
What did I mean by that?
What do I have going on?
So, I will take the train on the way home.
I will be done with work at around 7, so after that...
Gee, it is great that you decided to tag along, Naruko.
I was counting on you being there when I made plans,
so I was pretty worried when you told me you would not come.
Ryou would be pissed at you, otherwise.
Ryou has nothing to do with it.
You have been really unsociable lately, you know?
We were even wondering if you still wanted to be friends or not.
Do not you think so, Naruko?
The next one does not come for another 30 minutes.
You are the same as always.
In fact, it is creepy how much you have not changed.
How do you want me to act, then?
Do you want me taunt you can call you a femboy?
I would appreciate it if you did not try to use me to restore balance to your self-esteem.
Thanks to you, I managed to put an end to a few things.
So then he texts me, saying he loves me!
Sounds like a dream come true.
She got a train and rode it all the way to the city.
And she is lugging around a huge shopping bag.
You would know all about that.
There are certain things you cannot manage unless you change your costume.
Stick the next one in, Ryou.
Do not talk like a slutty schoolgirl.
I do not care what it is, just hurry up, Ryou!
What you going to do schoolgirl?
You look like you are forcing yourself to stay.
Hey, want to get out of here?
Naruko and I are going to call it quits.
I think she is not feeling well, and I have to get up early tomorrow, too.
I got to catch One Piece, y'know.
Does not One Piece air the day after tomorrow?
Tell all about it later, Naruko.
Is the train station really this way?
I thought we would just walk to the station together...
That is not what get out of here means.
And I am a bit buzzed, so I want to rest for a bit.
I-I am really not feeling well, so...
Should not you get some rest, too, then?
You are talking about a different kind of rest, though!
One Piece airs the day after tomorrow.
Why do not you just go by yourself?
Would not it be a waste though?
They are black are not they?
I said I do not want to!
I am hanging out with Yadomi right now.
I just rescued a girl from the arms of a man.
That was the most cliched thing I have ever done.
Would not a rescue involve throwing a punch or two and tearing me away?
I am hot and I am smart, but unfortunately I am a bit lacking in the strength department.
I do not want to be told that by a tranny.
Want To go out with me?
What do you see in that guy?
What do I see in him?
Do not act like you have figured it out!
I never said I liked him...
He was a leader, smart, and athletic.
But that was all in the past.
That is true, but he is kind in unexpected ways...
And I think if he fixed his hair, he would look a bit like Yama from Hey!
I do not even know if I like him.
I just cannot stop thinking about him.
Menma died, then his mother died.
It became tough to talk to him.
I was actually a bit happy that we would be going to the same school.
But Yadomi cannot forget about Menma.
You cannot forget the Yadomi that cannot forget about Menma.
Back then you said Yadomi's name.
You said you would been hanging out together.
We are letting an express train pass.
So why are you eating at my house?
Did not I bring you some wild plants in exchange?
He looks like he is really enjoying it.
You have got dirt above your nose.
Menma should eat some tempura too.
Do you seriously believe in her?
Did not I already say so?
I have thought it over once more.
I am not sure about this, but Menma being here probably is not a good thing, right?
It means she could not go to heaven.
So that must be why she is here.
Hey Menma, how about giving us a little hint?
I will grant it quicker than you can ring a bell.
There is something you want right?
You can rely on me a bit, too, you know?
I want to let you go to heaven.
And let me see you, too.
I want to talk with everyone else!
But I just do not know...
How about we all think about it together, Menma?
I do not know about my wish, or about going to heaven.
Let us think about it together.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
aa hanabi ga yozora kirei ni saite chotto setsunaku
aa kaze ga jikan to tomo ni nagareru
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
The fireworks blossomed heartrendingly beautiful across the night sky,
and time passed as swiftly as the wind.
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
I do not get it at all.
